page.title: 11RECREATION -CONTINUED.
page.content: PATRICK "MY MOTHER'S FAVOURITE HOBBY IS HORSE RIDING. WE HAVE FOUR PONIES AND MY MOTHER LOOKS AFTER THEM ALL IN HER SPARE TIME." {PHILLIP "MY FATHER LIKES SHOOTING {BECAUSE HE LIKES TO PRESERVE THE {ANIMALS OR BIRDS HE SHOOTS BY STUFFING {THEM."} PAUL "MY FATHER FISHES IN THE RIVER NEATH.THE FISHING SEASON LASTS FROM MARCH 1ST TO SEPTEMBER 30TH. HE HAS TWO FISHING RODS,A NET AND A FISHING LICENCE WHICH COSTS Â£18.FOR BAIT HE USES MAGGOTS. HE TRIES TO CATCH TROUT BUT SOMETIMES HE WILL LAND AN EEL.OFTEN MY FATHER STAYS OUT FOR AS MUCH AS THREE HOURS WAITING FOR FISH TO BITE. HE SITS ON A BIG STONE ENJOYING THE PEACE AND QUIET."
